interactivity.requirements: 5 Yasu Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Transference " from Yasu Yasui
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the New Hope Cathedral at night

progression.synopsis: Since Yasu isn't waiting outside New Hope Cathedral, Sensei assumes that God god is okay with him going inside this time. He thinks for a while about religion and its uses (but not about perception). Yasu is pleased to see him, and talks about how those who "make a big enough dent in the armor of older gods" can graduate and become "angels" who "decide who stays and who goes". She also talks about whether the transference she previously mentioned would or would not involve "touching", and about how God's needs should be paramount in the process. Sensei is unconvinced, but says that he will keep visiting her.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p2.
